Title: Dr. Ben / Nick
Plot: In the first segment, Louie goes to a doctor who's an old high school friend with an odd sense of humor. In the second segment, after performing at the Comedy Cellar, he dines with a fellow comedian who harbors passionate political views.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, sexual material and other content that may offend
GuestStars: Ricky Gervais, Nick DiPaolo, David Patrick Kelly
